3: A friendly reminder from Korolev: Dear children, please treat public facilities with love and care—
Serious offenders will be separated from their parents for one week in correctional facilities.
You sure a child can climb up here?
Don't pay attention to the broadcast, Liv.
Okay... But did we break it...?
Yeah, the observation cabin of the space station has been destroyed.
Incoming... communication...
Gray... Raven?
Miss Celica? How did you manage to contact us?
Great... I knew... It was you...
We just... launched... a relay satellite, trying to... establish... more... communications...
The signal is still horrible.
Right, I wanted... to tell you... Thanks to you, the observation deck... was destroyed...
The accuracy of... space station's beyond-visual-range attack... is rapidly dropping...
Babylonia... is safe now. Re-adjusting... position...
That's great...
You can... continue... with your original... mission...
Wait... Someone's attacking the relay satellite...
Boom—
Sss—
Miss Celica?
The satellite's probably been shot down...
Even after we removed their long-range attacks, there is still a lot of close-quarter firepower...
We better stick to the plan and get rid of their defense system. Only then can we establish stable communications to help the subsequent main force to land.
Liv, can you find the route?
Um... These compartments have been constantly moving. I need to compare them again...
A friendly reminder from Korolev: To visit the next compartment, please follow the green arrows on the corridor—
Green arrows start to light up along the corridor.
Understood, Commandant.
Huh? What is this...
Someone is probably watching us.
